hero_presentation:
Student in 3rd year Bachelor's degree in work-study program at SupDeVinci (Rennes).
I contribute within CNSI - S&D to the development of a Warehouse Management System for warehouses, as well as a separate application for supplier-side order management.

Learning JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, Java, C#, HTML, CSS, Symfony, SQL. Realization of Symfony projects:

subsection1.title: Internship at Diluz (4 weeks)
subsection1.description:
Creation of 3 pages on an internal business site (accounting) to visualize maximum information on files.
Technologies: Vue.js / Nuxt / Node.js / Sequelize / PostgreSQL

subsection1.title: Internship at Diluz (8 weeks)
subsection1.description:
Redesign of the intranet to make it more interactive and modernize the design. Subsequently participated in ticketing of the internal accounting application Talenz Toaden.

subsection1.title: Bachelor's Degree in Development
subsection1.description:
Work-study program focused on frontend and backend development, web integration, and business projects.

subsection1.title: Work-Study - CNSI / S&D
subsection1.description:
Contributing to the development of a Warehouse Management System for warehouses and a supplier-side order management application.
